climbs.name: Son of a Bolt Gun
climbs.fa: Randall Green, Ted Sims & Jake Mergenthaler

content.description:
Climb up to and past the short, blunt arete, and then move left over the steeper upper red face towards the chains.

Descent:

Rappel route.
content.protection: Bolts to chains. Shares anchor with Orange Crush.
content.location: Start behind the large afternoon shade tree. Right side bolt line on Sunfire Slab. Fire Spire to the right.

climbs.name: Orange Crush
climbs.fa: Randall Green, Ted Sims & Jake Mergenthaler 2001

content.description:
Climb the grey slab over the bulge onto the chert covered face above.

Descent:

Rappel route.
content.protection: Bolts to chains. Shares anchor with "Son of a Bolt Gun".
content.location: Start behind the large shady tree. Middle bolt line.

climbs.name: Dirty Old Men
climbs.fa: Jake Mergenthaler, Randall Green & Ted Sims 2001

content.description:
Easier slab climbing to the roof with thin holds, onto a steeper chert covered face.

Descent:

Rappel route.
content.location: Start on a good ledge under the large chossy looking corner up high, left most bolt line.
